website_summaries.verdict: Crayola’s mammoth coloring book sports a huge variety of scenes to please every kid, it’s easy to remove completed art for the fridge, and this is a great investment for hardcore coloring enthusiasts.
pros: Enormous variety of coloring page themes, such as cats, sloths, dinosaurs, and unicorns
cons: Since other drawing tools may bleed through the page, this is intended for crayons only

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for entertaining my kids on a long road trip. This is just what I was looking for!!! It’s just coloring pages...no puzzles etc that are too complex for my 3yo. Every page has one full size coloring picture. There are 2 full pages of stickers too. The book is quite thick...I didn’t realize it was going to have so many pages but that is definitely not a bad thing! I also love that the coloring pages are fairly gender neutral for the most part...nothing overly “girly” or “boyish”. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: SUPERmom3

customer_reviews.title: The Epic Book of Awesome by Crayola
customer_reviews.text: Excellent book. Saw in a store at Easter time and came home ordered it right away. I don't normally like kids book but this one really struck me with the unique pictures. My 5 year old granddaughter saw a picture grandma had colored and wanted to color or to, so I had to order her one too. Recommended to an adult coloring friend of mine and she ordered it too.
customer_reviews.author: Angila Rhone

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for my kid, my mom stole it
customer_reviews.text: The 4yo loves it. Loves that monkeys have unicorn horns, loves that mermaids have unicorn horns, love that cats have unicorn horns. There are a lot of unicorn horns in this one. But the pictures are bold and fun and even I had a good time coloring a few pages. But grandma went bonkers for it and I had to steal it away from her in the middle of the night just so we could take it home with us. Buy two of them, is my advice.
customer_reviews.author: bella

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality. Colors bleed through multiple pages and sheets tear off even on touch
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. Colors all bleed through the page and the design on the back is ruined. Can only he used with crayons. As soon as my kid opened the book two sheets came off in her hands. The pages tear out even when flipping through the sheet. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: sid dhodi

customer_reviews.title: Unexpectedly Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this book is pretty low. I colored the first page in color pencil and the lining of the pictures bled through the next 10 pages to the point where I couldn't cover the black bleed with the pencils. Also, the pages are perforated for easy tear out pages but they literally tear out easily. While coloring in one of the book, the first page tore out. The pictures in the book are definitely for older kids...so i'll give it that praise. Other than that, I wish I made a different coloring book purchase with better quality.
customer_reviews.author: F D

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected with the quality
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed, I got this for a kindergarten class, I expected better quality paper. This paper was thin and that dark recycled type. Would definitely tear easily with younger kids or markers.
customer_reviews.author: Mer

customer_reviews.title: My family's favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter for her birthday. I knew she would be excited and love the various characters and funny scenarios featured throughout and spend hours coloring and it... Why I didn't expect was that everyone in our family would want to color along with her! There's such a variety of coloring pages and pages for different skill sets. I definitely recommend this to anyone wanting to have a bit of funny fun while coloring.
customer_reviews.author: LG Moses

customer_reviews.title: Truly JUMBO when it comes to amount of pages
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 of these coloring books, 1 for myself and 1 for the little girl I babysit. This coloring book is actually JUMBO, as in it has a lot of pages compared to the average coloring books these days. The pages in this book are very sturdy and dont rip easily with a young child using colored pencils on them. The pages havent bled with the use of markers yet, so I think this is a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Amy B

customer_reviews.title: Chunky coloring book!
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty awesome coloring book. I bought this thinking that it would be those large coloring sheet type books and was a little surprised when I got a regular coloring book, however this is one thick coloring book. Will definitely take a while to go through. The pictures are fun/funny and some are whimsical. Had a pretty good variety of pictures that would cater to a wide array of interests and animals as well. Super cute and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a ridiculous sale price, but it's great at full price. BIG! Stickers! Easy enough for my babies to pick up and use on their own. The stickers are removable so my little 2 yr old could put them on her own belongings, no damage. It was a great happy moment when they spotted Grammie had got this and Crayolas for their little visit. Since I was little, Crayola is always a trusted and happy good time
customer_reviews.author: K. Celata

customer_reviews.title: HUGE Book
customer_reviews.text: This will keep you (or your kiddos) entertained for a long time! I'm an adult but adult coloring books are too detailed and time consuming. Other coloring books for kids are way too simple. This book is a good middle ground. I was very impressed with how thick it is, and there are lots of adorable illustrations inside! The paper is typical coloring book quality, and the pages are perforated so you can take them out easily though I haven't taken any out of mine so I can't speak for how clean the tear is.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: My Kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: This book seems to be great for my boy who is 10, daughter who is 5 and a little boy who I tend that is 3. They all just love it. Each are able to find a picture and tear it out of the book then color away. Great price for how big it actually is. Would definitely gift to any family members or friends kids who like to color.
customer_reviews.author: Teshara Palmer

customer_reviews.title: 288 pages of awesome!
customer_reviews.text: 288 pages of awesome. Kids love the silly combinations of pictures, including unicorns, caticorns, frogicorns, tacocorns, and many other unicorn themed pictures. Pics to color for girls and boys, stickers too.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Lots of pages to enjoy but are too thin
customer_reviews.text: I like that this coloring book has lots of pages and the pictures are kid-friendly (animals doing fun activities). It also has two pages of stickers. However, the pages are too thin that you could actually see through the print at the back of a page. Markers are a no-no. You could just crayons or color pencils.
customer_reviews.author: Jhyza

customer_reviews.title: Fun pages
customer_reviews.text: I love coloring books....errrrrrr....well I love coloring way more than playing dolls, kitchen, or dinosaur battle. The only thing I wish is that the pages were one-sided and thick....so we could take paint colors to them.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Elofson

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Medium
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money! There are a huge number of pages in this coloring book. It was for my 6 year old grandson so I didn’t want baby coloring pages but I also didn’t want tiny detailed pages either. This was the perfect medium! Would make a great gift. I just added crayons & coloring pencils. So pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: childhood revisited
customer_reviews.text: After buying this book locally for my niece and nephew, I decided this Auntie needed one of her own. This is a great coloring book! The pictures appeal to everyone. The pages are good for crayons or colored pencil, but marker bleeds through pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: Nonnie

customer_reviews.title: They ALL loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Big book! Tons of pages to color! I thought only the four year old would like it, but I had four kids, ages 4-8 squabbling over it immediately. Eventually everyone found pages they liked and peace reigned again for a hour or so. (Of course we had to cut out those pages so they all had their favorites.) I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn A Irish

customer_reviews.title: Perfect coloring books for preschoolers
customer_reviews.text: This coloring book is wonderful! I bought one for each of my day care kids for Christmas and they loved them. The pictures are big with a lot of space for small hands to learn to stay in the lines. I like there are no puzzle pages mixed in the coloring pages. I bought these for 3 yr olds who don’t read and it's hard to find good coloring books without all the puzzle pages. I will be ordering two more to keep on hand at day care as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie A. Hardt

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice coloring book wide variety of pages. And the pages are thick so they arent see thru. They are traditional textured coloring pages not the printer paper feeling kind. I prefer that though. My toddler also really likes the designs
customer_reviews.author: Dreyc + HaileyJ

customer_reviews.title: Big book
customer_reviews.text: My son needed a large coloring book for his school supply list and I was running out of time! I ended up ordering this one and he really likes it. He's six and thinks the mash up of animals are pretty cool! The biggest problem is that my 10 year old daughter is upset she didn't get one too. I can see that some people would think this is a little too girly for a boy, but my star wars and paw patrol loving boy likes it plenty!
customer_reviews.author: Katie R

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a fun coloring book for my kids during the stay at home orders. Sadly, the pages are very thin. All colors bleed through and you can only color one side. The black ink that outlines the design also smudges a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Julie M VandenBerg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Coloring Book!!!
customer_reviews.text: This coloring book is great quality and is full of great coloring pages...would definitely buy again...lots of pages...will keep kids busy for a long period of time! A+++
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B.

customer_reviews.title: Cool pages but poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: This coloring book has a lot of fun pictures and is really cool. My daughter really likes it but unfortunately the binding gave out within the first few days. I had to reinforce it with packing tape, it will work but she just got it for her birthday kinda disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as big as I thought for price
customer_reviews.text: I assumed it would be nicer for the price. It was for a birthday gift and I had to go buy more to make gift nicer but kids love to color so I’m sure it was appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: stew

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Great coloring books for kids
customer_reviews.text: He’s a great coloring books I have a five-year-old and a two-year-old that love the color so I’m always mailing these to them. Great price
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: It has been a long time at home with the kids. Thank goodness for the time they can spend coloring. There are a lot of pages and my son loves it. If you have a child that likes to color, this would be a good book for them.
customer_reviews.author: T. Singleton

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: If anyone wants to know.. The pages are brown and thin. They’re not on white paper. The printout ink are faded on many pages.
customer_reviews.author: Ultbruin

customer_reviews.title: Great for the kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book because my school’s afterschool child care was seeking donations and it seemed like a good value. The kids love this book. It’s one of their favorites. Within about a week they’d colored at least half of it so that’s a good sign.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Mistook giant for giant pages. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I searched for giant meaning large pages not a huge coloring book. I guess that is my fault but when it said huge i thought each page was large.
customer_reviews.author: Brittni

customer_reviews.title: Funny, big picture coloring book
customer_reviews.text: This is what i do while I watch football with my husband and son. I love a coloring in big picture books. This perfect and the pictires make me laugh. 😁
customer_reviews.author: west

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was fantastic!!! Bought it for myself and am having a great time coloring it. Bought it as an add on and am using crayons. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Simopoulos

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: Worst book coloring purchase..bought this based on the reviews and it’s just so bad.. pages are dull and thin..terribly made..breaks off so easily..don’t recommend at all
customer_reviews.author: Sara Soliman

customer_reviews.title: Best crayons ever!
customer_reviews.text: Good selection of colors, and a great value! Bought them for my 3-year-old granddaughter and she loves them. Excellent for little hands to hold, won't break like traditional crayons, and are easy to twist up or down for more or less crayon to show. Payton and Mawmaw will have hours and hours of coloring fun with these!
customer_reviews.author: gina h.

customer_reviews.title: Kids will love it
customer_reviews.text: My nieces and nephews loved these coloring pages. They are a bit funky and unique but they thought they were fun and different. It's also an awesome deal for your money with all the coloring pages it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: The ink is much too smudgey.
customer_reviews.text: Thin paper, ink smudges into the colors, and many of the pages have a mirror image of the previous page transferred over the intended picture. Just about worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzy

customer_reviews.title: Funky and cute!
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended this coloring book to me, and my 4 and 2 year olds love it, as do I! The pictures are funky and cute and fun to color because you can use all kinds of fun colors and patterns.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Ryan

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This may be one of the most fun coloring books I’ve ever seen! It’s really big and the pages are simple so it’s great for younger kids with shorter attention spans and the first two pages are full of super cute stickers. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Logan

customer_reviews.title: Eh not that good
customer_reviews.text: Not that good, paper is bad quality and art is too strange
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Theimer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste money, Very thin paper
customer_reviews.text: Paper quality is very bad, little pressure on the paper it rips off... not worth the money. Buy “My First Big Book Of Coloring” it’s so much better.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Thick Book, bright stickers
customer_reviews.text: This book is pretty thick! The paper is pretty standard but should be ok with colored pencils or crayons. Definitely recommend for it's cute and unique pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Stephany L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome coloring book!
customer_reviews.text: Like the title suggests, this coloring book is EPIC. I had to buy another for my middle daughter so her and her older sister wouldn't fit over the cool stickers it came with.
customer_reviews.author: Casey S.

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my daughter and going to buy me one their is lots of pages and lots of cute designs and love everything about it
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Smaller/Thin pages - not the giant coloring book.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was the individual bigger sheets- as it came up when I searched giant coloring books and the pic looks like they are the individual pages. The book isn’t bad but it’s not like the newer, crisp, better quality books that crayola has been coming out with.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: A year later and my 5yr old and 4 yr old (each for their own) still love it! There are so many pages! It's the one coloring book they both color on a weekly (sometimes daily) basis. We had originally bought it for a long road trip and it kept them occupied. Now they have continued to love it. I'm yet to find a better coloring book for the price. I wish they would come out with another version. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennelle Hines

customer_reviews.title: Cute pictures, TERRIBLE PAPER
customer_reviews.text: The paper is that god-awful brownish grey like the coloring books at the Dollar Tree. Which is horrible, because these pictures are great. So sad.
customer_reviews.author: Arius

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre paper quality
customer_reviews.text: Paper is heavily recycled, so it's overly porous and gray so it doesn't take crayon or marker very well. Overall it's fine but expected better quality from Crayola.
customer_reviews.author: Raleigh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect distraction and fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for any child to keep themselves occupied and have lots of fun at the same time. For the very low price you don't want to miss out on this one
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: BIG book!
customer_reviews.text: This book is truly AWESOME. My kids blow through most coloring books, but this one they really enjoy due to the whimsical images. It's also a BIG book so it takes them longer to work through.
customer_reviews.author: Clandahlina

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious pictures to color
customer_reviews.text: We got this boom for my sons 5th birthday and I use it more than he does. The pictures are all hilarious! Easy for the kids to color, plus they are all pictures of animals or desserts, ya know fun stuff for kids (and their parents)
customer_reviews.author: chads

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: Awesome book. My daughter loves it. And she isn’t easily entertained. Do not hesitate to buy this one. I’ve bought some that were pretty boring but this one is actually pretty cool
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Fun & unique color pages
customer_reviews.text: Cute coloring book with lots of fun & interesting pages. Perforated pages makes them easy to tear out. I’m giving 4 stars because it said it came with 2 sticker pageS and it only had one. My daughter loves stickers and that’s one of the reasons I ordered this book.
customer_reviews.author: MandaK

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest coloring book! The pictures are funny and cute the little ones love it. There are so many drawling's as well the book is huge. I would totally recommend this especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: corryn

customer_reviews.title: Great for ages 4-8
customer_reviews.text: I’m a school nurse and my kids love it. I like the perforated pages. If they go back to class or go home they can easily take their page with them.
customer_reviews.author: Tee Q

customer_reviews.title: Great coloring book
customer_reviews.text: My 4.5 year old twins are obsessed. They go through 10 pages a day. Easy to tear pages out, although they are thin. Images are nice and easy to color.
customer_reviews.author: Deja C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, funny, fun pictures to color in a well- made coloring book. The pages tear out easily and cleanly. 4 and 6 year old approved.
customer_reviews.author: Mangoz

customer_reviews.title: Nice coloring book without added activities
customer_reviews.text: I had this coloring book (that I bought somewhere else) at my house for my 6 yr old granddaughter to color. She loved it so much she wanted to take it home. So of course I needed a replacement. The store where I bought the first one didn’t have it anymore but I found it on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: jackie young

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 1.5 years old and loves coloring in this! Perfect to tear out a page and send it to family and friends if you want.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Quiel

customer_reviews.title: Great activity!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this color book! We have all colored out of it! Lots of cute pics and it includes stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Robin N.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old LOVES this! Very creative drawings that just tickle him. He's only recently showed an interest in coloring, and this coloring book has made him an avid little 'artist'! Plus, I'll color with him, and I enjoy it too LOL
customer_reviews.author: dftba

customer_reviews.title: A nice book but nothing epic.
customer_reviews.text: This activity book is nice but nothing epic. My daughter uses it some but she found the book not as appealing as other craft and books.
customer_reviews.author: JWylie

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my sister who just likes to color and not do activities. She loves it. I love it too that I may get myself one.
customer_reviews.author: Mizan

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: My little one loves this book! It came with stickers as well!!! Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Expected it to be larger based on photo.
customer_reviews.text: As expensive as this is I would want it to be larger, better quality paper. More like marker paper. This paper is definitely intended for crayon use.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very big and fun coloring book. My kids thought several pictures were very funny. It was fun flipping through the pages and watching my kids decide which one to color.
customer_reviews.author: Paulina

customer_reviews.title: Great for the grandkids!
customer_reviews.text: Great! You can't go wrong with Crayola! Lots of great pictures to color for many ages.
customer_reviews.author: Gene & Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: It’s a thick book and almost has everything. One thing I don’t like is that the book is two sided painted, and the color would easily bleed through the paper.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good Size and Picture Variety
customer_reviews.text: This coloring book is a good size and has enough variety to keep kids or whomever entertained.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Really incredible book! Huge book
customer_reviews.text: My kids having been over this for days now. It's a massive book of stickers, pictures, and cute drawings! This was worth it!
customer_reviews.author: jillian

customer_reviews.title: Funny, great value and size
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old son loves this coloring book! The pages are all silly drawings that make him laugh, and it's so big it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice coloring book comes with stickers
customer_reviews.text: Awesome coloring book it’s super cute and has a variety of different things to color I think its a good gender neutral coloring book and good for both boys and girls and it comes with stickers too
customer_reviews.author: Christine Horn

customer_reviews.title: Best kids coloring book ever !!
customer_reviews.text: OMG !!! This is the cutest coloring book ever !! Super kid / adult friendly !!! Really cute stickers ! I love this coloring book !!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Weird sloths
customer_reviews.text: I love coloring books. What I didn’t love is all the sloths. They’re weird and look like they’re stoned.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to a friends little boy to help pass the quarantined time and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great time pass for kids... such an affordable price Thanks amazon
customer_reviews.author: Megha V.

customer_reviews.title: Great coloring book!
customer_reviews.text: Great coloring book for kids or toddlers. My son loves to color and he really enjoys this book!
customer_reviews.author: Devina Dotson

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandchildren while they are in quarantine,they loved it
customer_reviews.author: James Davis

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Huge coloring book with a good amount of stickers. My son loves itz
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and good to share with others.
customer_reviews.text: I got this coloring book for my grandkids to share is a big book with lots if pages to chose from. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: The quality of papers are just so so, but the pictures are cute and fun, my toddler loves this book. I’d recommend to paint this book with crayons not marks as each paper is very thin, the color could easily bleeds into the next pages.
customer_reviews.author: Rong Z

customer_reviews.title: nice coloring book for kids
customer_reviews.text: it's a large book and that's the reason I think it would be too ,large for a child tom take aLONG
customer_reviews.author: Gramps

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun and Hilarious
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I mean this in the best way possible. The creators of this book must have been smoking something because the pictures are a total trip! I recommend this book for rehab centers to soothe the patients and let them remember the good ol’ days. My kids love it, and I have found hilarious pages to color myself! Hey, let’s put frickin’ unicorn horns on frickin’ everything! Well done, Crayola!
customer_reviews.author: RStodden217

customer_reviews.title: Cannot find workable medium with paper
customer_reviews.text: Color pencils do not work well with this paper. Watecolors will bleed through. Crayon pigments don't adhere well either. Not sure what to use to color these pictures.
customer_reviews.author: TechGirl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Coloring Time
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and fanciful illustrations by Crayola. Great for kids and your inner-child to color :-)
customer_reviews.author: S 'n' E

customer_reviews.title: Fun and creative 7 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 7 year old she loves coloring and this is great. She's loves the pages and the included stickers. Definitely happy with how much she's enjoying it and will be looking for more incase of rainy days ot keeping her busy and creative.
customer_reviews.author: Conlan Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: COOLEST coloring book, so many good pictures. Not like your average boring book, I enjoy coloring in this as well and I'm 31
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great coloring book!
customer_reviews.text: My six year old daughter loves this book! The images are fun and the pages rip out nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin J. Vilina

customer_reviews.title: Cool book !
customer_reviews.text: Very nice coloring book ! Keeps my kid engaged for sometime ..
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! The black outline doesn’t smudge. Please consider this cute coloring book!
customer_reviews.author: Keke08

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought as part of a gift and was pleasantly surprised at the number of pages. It’s a lot more substantial than I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: rinsaab

customer_reviews.title: COOL COLORING BOOK!
customer_reviews.text: Great book for coloring! My daughter loves her crayon & coloring book set! 💕
customer_reviews.author: Epiphani Inez Painia

customer_reviews.title: Paper quality is not that good ...
customer_reviews.text: Paper quality is not that good ... but since there are many pages it’s worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Cute & quirky
customer_reviews.text: Very interesting (perhaps edging towards odd? pictures) Kids mostly love it. Nice and thick...lots of pages.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Pics are great!
customer_reviews.text: So fun! I actually bought this for a brain-break activity for my 8th graders. They love the fun pictures.
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Green

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this. For the money ..you are better off voicing to the dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my daughter!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 8 year old daughter! Not too fine of details for young colorers, but lots of fun to color elements to each picture.
customer_reviews.author: Sara.e.

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: Super fun and unexpected picture combinations make this book a favorite
customer_reviews.author: dbt

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7yo & she LOVES it. Si many pages to color & stickers! Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this coloring book! I bought them a few books for our road trip a few weeks ago and this was the one they liked the most :)
customer_reviews.author: Babyruth0101

product_meta.title: Crayola Epic Book of Awesome, All-in-One Coloring Book Set, 288 Pages, Kids Indoor Activities, Gift
product_meta.description: Style:Epic Book of AwesomePresenting a colossal collection of coloring pages from Crayola. This 288-page tome offers the best of Crayola uni-creatures, sloths love llamas, Squad goals, and cosmic cats coloring books in one huge volume. Also included are 2 sticker sheets so kids can deck out their coloring art even more. This giant-sized book is the perfect travel companion for long trips—with hours and hours of creative, entertaining activities for your little traveling companions. Also makes a great gift for all occasions. For an extra-special surprise, pair with the Crayola ultimate crayon collection. Ideal for kids, age 3 and up.
feature_bullets: 288 COLORING PAGES: A delightful compilation of our favorite coloring pages from the uni-creatures, Sloths love llamas, Squad goals, and cosmic Cats coloring books.
AT HOME CRAFTS & INDOOR ACTIVITIES: Keep spirits high with creative art supplies! Simple and fun crafts for kids are a great way to stay thoughtfully engaged and entertained.

COLORING BOOK FOR BOYS & GIRLS: Kids love to color, and with well over 200 pages of coloring fun, this one coloring book will keep them happy through Many long road trips, plane rides, sleepovers, rainy days, and more.
GLITTER ANIMAL STICKERS: To add to the fun, kids can use the 2 sticker sheets included to decorate their coloring pages, or wherever else they might like a bit of flair.
FOIL EMBELLISHMENTS: Kids unwrapping this fun coloring book on holidays or birthdays will be delighted by the foil enhanced cover, which features a few of the fun characters to be found inside.
GIFT FOR KIDS: Ideal for kids, age 3 & up.
